dark:border-stone-800"}],["$","$L6","7",{"delay":0.35000000000000003,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"创作背景"}]}],["$","p","8",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"此诗作于唐肃宗乾元二年（759年）三月。当年春天，李白因永王李璘案，被流放夜郎，取道四川赶赴被贬谪的地方。行至白帝城的时候，忽然收到赦免的消息，惊喜交加，随即乘舟东下江陵。此诗即回舟抵江陵时所作，所以诗题一作\"白帝下江陵\"。"}],["$","hr","9",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}],["$","$L6","10",{"delay":0.5,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"译文"}]}],["$","p","11",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"清晨，我告别高入云霄的白帝城，江陵远在千里，船行只一日时间。"}],"$L9","$La","$Lb","$Lc","$Ld","$Le","$Lf","$L10","$L11","$L12","$L13"]}]}]}],"$L14"]}]}],"$L15"]}],["$L16","$L17"],"$L18"]}],"loading":null,"isPartial":false}
9:["$","p","12",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"两岸猿声还在耳边不停地啼叫，不知不觉轻舟已穿过万重青山。"}]
a:["$","hr","13",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
b:["$","$L6","14",{"delay":0.7000000000000001,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"赏析"}]}]
c:["$","p","15",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗写的是从白帝城到江陵一天之内的行程情况，主要突出轻快，这也反映了李白心情的轻快。"}]
d:["$","p","16",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"首句\"朝辞白帝彩云间\"，\"彩云间\"三字，描写白帝城地势之高，为全篇描写下水船走得快这一动态蓄势。\"彩云间\"的\"间\"字当作隔断之意，诗人回望云霞之上的白帝城，以前的种种恍如隔世。"}]
e:["$","p","17",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"第二句\"千里江陵一日还\"，\"千里\"和\"一日\"，以空间之远与时间之短作悬殊对比。这里巧妙地方在于\"还\"字，它不仅表现出诗人\"一日\"而行\"千里\"的痛快，也隐隐透露出遇赦的喜悦。"}]
f:["$","p","18",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"第三句\"两岸猿声啼不住\"，\"啼不住\"是说猿猴的啼叫一声接一声，不间断。古时长江三峡，常有高猿长啸，属引凄异，空谷传响，哀转久绝。李白身在如脱弦之箭、顺流直下的船上，心情十分畅快，当然也没有心情去仔细品味猿啼的凄凉了。"}]
10:["$","p","19",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"第四句\"轻舟已过万重山\"，为了形容船快，诗人除了用\"一日\"作对比，还给船本身添上了一个\"轻\"字。\"轻\"字别有用意，三峡水急滩险，诗人乘的是快船，当然会感到轻快；而流放遇赦的诗人，心情也是轻松的。"}]
11:["$","p","20",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"全诗给人一种锋棱挺拔、空灵飞动之感。快船快意，使人神远，这就是此诗明显的艺术特色。"}]
12:["$","hr","21",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
13:["$","div","22",{"className":"mt-10 pt-6 border-t border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800","children":[["$","h4",null,{"className":"text-sm font-medium text-stone-500 dark:text-stone-400 mb-3","children":"标签"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","0",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"流放"}],["$","span","1",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"遇赦"}],["$","span","2",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"长江"}],["$","span","3",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"轻快"}],["$","span","4",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"唐代"}]]}]]}]
14:["$","$L6",null,{"delay":0.2,"children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-8 flex justify-between items-center","children":[["$","$L2",null,{"href":"/#唐代","className":"inline-flex items-center gap-2 text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 hover:text-stone-900 dark:hover:text-stone-200 transition-colors","children":[["$","svg",null,{"className":"w-5 h-5","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","viewBox":"0 0 24 24","children":["$","path",null,{"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","strokeWidth":2,"d":"M19 11H7.83l5.59-5.59L12 4l-8 8 8 8 1.41-1.41L7.83 13H19v-2z"}]}],"返回","唐代"]}],["$","$L19",null,{"title":"早发白帝城","author":"李白","dynasty":"唐代","poemLines":["朝辞白帝彩云间","千里江陵一日还","两岸猿声啼不住","轻舟已过万重山"],"tags":["流放","遇赦","长江","轻快","唐代"]}]]}]}]
